home.lead: Bikeable lists critical spots for cyclists and helps to improve the infrastructure.
home.newsletter: Subscribe to our newsletter and stay up to date on all things Bikeable!

addform.title: Title
addform.uploadimage: Upload a picture of your spot
addform.willbearchived: Because of the selected categories, this spot will be archived after one month.

entry.fixed: This spot has been improved in the meantime.
entry.register: Register now and join the discussion!
entry.addphotodesc: Do you have an additional image of this spot? Upload it here!
entry.addphotofix: My photo confirms that this spot has been fixed
entry.proposetext: This spot has been fixed. | This spot is fixed if one more user marks it as fixed. You can also upload an image as proof. | This spot is fixed if {n} more users mark it as fixed. You can also upload an image as proof.
entry.archivedon: This spot will be archived on the following date:

notfound.pagenotfound: This page could not be found

register.acceptconditions: I accept the General Terms and Conditions of Business and Use and acknowledge the Privacy Policy.

termsandconditions.title: General Terms and Conditions of Business and Use

deleteaccount.title: Delete account
deleteaccount.explanation: To delete your account, you can send us an email from your account email with the request to delete the account:
deleteaccount.what_text: Only your account with your details (email, username, password, picture) will be deleted, your spots and comments will remain. You can delete your spots and comments yourself beforehand if you wish.
